description.displayText: Kinga was the best Nanny I ever hired to take care of my children. Her attention to detail, and her fantastic personality makes her stand out from the others. She played a vital role in helping me taking care of my family. I would definitely recommend her to anyone who is looking for the right person to take care of their little ones.
description.originalText: Kinga was the best Nanny I ever hired to take care of my children. Her attention to detail, and her fantastic personality makes her stand out from the others. She played a vital role in helping me taking care of my family. I would definitely recommend her to anyone who is looking for the right person to take care of their little ones.

description.displayText: Kinga was great! She used to take care of my kids, she did crafts with them, took them for little adventures, such as going to playgrounds and parks, in addition to many more activities around the house. She always had a phenomenal attitude towards her job and my children.and paid extra attention to details in regards working with my family. We loved her a lot. You won't regret making her your next nanny for your children.
